section.title: Specification
section.para: An e-mail based discussion forum has been set up specifically to help people working on the development of CommonType fonts and associated technologies.

listitem.para: To subscribe to the CommonType Mailing List, send e-mail to: CommonType-subscribe@topica.com
To post a message to the list, send e-mail to: CommonType@topica.com
To remove yourself from this mailing list, send e-mail to: CommonType-unsubscribe@topica.com
To get a list of archives available, browse to: http://topica.com/lists/CommonType/read
For more help with mailing list commands, browse to: http://topica.com/lists/CommonType/

section.para: Please note that if you join the forum your e-mail address will be accessible to the other subscribers.
